build-type.name: TW-51936 Incorrect test suite hierarchy when suites are reported via services me

parameters.param: echo "##teamcity[flowStarted flowId='suite']" echo "##teamcity[testSuiteStarted name='MySuite' flowId='suite']" echo "##teamcity[flowStarted flowId='nestedsuite' parent='suite']" echo "##teamcity[testSuiteStarted name='NestedSuite' flowId='nestedsuite']" echo "##teamcity[flowStarted flowId='test1' parent='nestedsuite']" echo "##teamcity[flowStarted flowId='test2' parent='nestedsuite']" echo "##teamcity[testStarted name='package_or_namespace.ClassName.TestName' flowId='test1']" echo "##teamcity[testStarted name='package_or_namespace.ClassName.TestName2' flowId='test2']" echo "##teamcity[testFinished name='package_or_namespace.ClassName.TestName' flowId='test1']" echo "##teamcity[testFinished name='package_or_namespace.ClassName.TestName2' flowId='test2']" echo "##teamcity[flowFinished flowId='test1']" echo "##teamcity[flowFinished flowId='test2']" echo "##teamcity[testSuiteFinished name='NestedSuite' flowId='nestedsuite']" echo "##teamcity[flowFinished flowId='nestedsuite']" echo "##teamcity[testSuiteFinished name='MySuite' flowId='suite']" echo "##teamcity[flowFinished flowId='suite']"
